item.description:
For April brunch, let's try British Beer Company in Franklin, MA.

Here's their website:   http://www.britishbeer.com/franklin/

So...a couple of things:

Brunch will be at 11:30 instead of our usual 11:00 because that's when they serve

They do not have a brunch menu on their website - it changes weekly.  The manager just sent me the brunch menu for the 14th.  She also told me that we can have omelettes made to order even though they aren't on the menu.

Maple BBQ Pulled Pork Bap - Our tender, slow roasted pulled pork combined with maple syrup and molasses added to our house scotch BBQ sauce, served on a bap roll and topped with cole slaw. Served with BBC Scotch BBQ homefries.    $8.99

Fuller's Scrambler - Fluffy fresh scrambled eggs tossed with a trio of sausage, bacon and ham, sautéed in Fullers Pride beer, topped with shredded cheddar cheese and served with BBC scotch BBQ homefries and a side of toast.       $8.99

BBC Pancakes "Your Way" - A hearty stack of fluffy pancakes made with your choice of Guinness, Root Beer or Cream Soda infused pancakes served with fresh whipped cream, maple syrup and whipped honey butter.    $7.99                

Crispy French Toast - Thick cut slices of French Bread from Mazzarelli's Bakery in Milford, dipped in an egg, cinnamon and vanilla mix, then coated with a layer of corn flake crumbs and grilled to perfection. Served with maple syrup and whipped cream.    $8.99

Traditional English Breakfast  -   Smoked traditional Bacon slices, grilled pork sausage, sliced fresh  grilled tomatoes, salted grilled mushrooms, hearty baked beans and three eggs cooked to your liking, served with your choice of toast and BBC Scotch BBQ home fries.        $9.99
item.how_to_find_us: I've made a reservation in my name
item.name: April Brunch - British Beer Company in Franklin
